name: Hero Quest
premise: Heroes must explore and conquer the dangerous dungeons, filled with monsters and treasures.
description: Hero Quest is a classic board game that combines elements of role-playing games with a straightforward, board-based dungeon crawl.
total_playtime_notes: Can vary based on the number of players and their familiarity with the game.
session_playtime_notes: Each quest is designed to be played in a single session.
immersiveness_level_notes: The theme and mechanics make players feel like they are part of a fantasy world.
learning_curve_notes: The game is easy to pick up but offers depth through its various mechanics.
save_mechanism_notes: Each session is a standalone game.
how_to_win: Complete the quest's objective before all heroes are defeated.
how_to_lose: All heroes are defeated before the quest's objective is completed.

setup.footprint_notes: Requires a reasonable amount of table space for the board and player components.
setup.time_notes: Setup time can be reduced with experience and organization.
setup.complexity_notes: While setup is not overly complex, it does require sorting and placement of various components.

teardown.time_notes: Teardown is straightforward, but sorting and storing components can take some time.

packaging.storage_notes: The game box includes insert trays to help organize and store components.
packaging.transport_notes: While the box is sturdy, its size can make it a bit unwieldy for transport.

artwork_notes: The artwork and components contribute to the immersive fantasy theme of the game.

components.type_notes: Components are durable and well-made, with detailed miniatures and sturdy game board.

replayability_notes: With a variety of quests and the potential for different strategies, the game offers high replayability.

scalability.players_notes: The game scales well with different numbers of players, though it is best with four.
scalability.experience_notes: While new players can join in, they may find themselves at a slight disadvantage due to the game's depth.

player_interaction_notes: As a cooperative game, players must work together to strategize and defeat the game's challenges.
